title: You cannot share screenshots of the admin panel

tosdr.case: you cannot share screenshots of your admin panel
tosdr.tldr: Cloudant users are not allowed to distribute or disclose the Hosting Platform to third parties. This includes, but isn't limited to,  displaying the Hosting Platform.
